summary: A documentary examining the decade of the 1970s as a turning point in American cinema. Some of today's best filmmakers interview the influential directors of that time.
cast: Robert Altman|John G. Avildsen|Warren Beatty|Linda Blair|Peter Bogdanovich|Peter Boyle|Marshall Brickman|Ellen Burstyn|John Calley|Jimmy Carter|John Cassavetes|Julie Christie|Francis Ford Coppola|Roger Corman|Bruce Dern|Clint Eastwood|Louise Fletcher|Jane Fonda|Peter Fonda|Milos Forman|William Friedkin|Pam Grier|Goldie Hawn|Monte Hellman|Jimi Hendrix|Dennis Hopper|Mick Jagger|Robert F. Kennedy|Ayatollah Ali Khamenei|Martin Luther King|Piper Laurie|Sidney Lumet|Paul Mazursky|Marshall McLuhan|Mike Medavoy|Richard Nixon|Polly Platt|Sydney Pollack|Ronald Reagan|Robert Redford|Dick Rodstein|Jerry Schatzberg|Roy Scheider|Paul Schrader|Martin Scorsese|Sissy Spacek|Robert Towne|Jon Voight
title: Una década bajo la influencia
